name: BACK TO THE EGG! Tower Defense
description: Classical tower defense game mixed with rpg elements - Filled with things to do and places to explore.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32-bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
